movies.title: Gone with the Wind
movies.plot: The spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation owner is forced to use every means at her disposal to claw her way out of poverty, following Maj. Gen. William Sherman's destructive "March to the Sea,” during the American Civil War.

events.title: using her new husband's money, Scarlet O'Hara writes a cheque to pay off the tax collector

movies.title: The Alamo
movies.plot: The legendary true story of a small band of soldiers who sacrificed their lives in hopeless combat against a massive army in order to prevent a tyrant from smashing the new Republic of Texas.

events.title: the Battle of the Alamo is fought

movies.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
movies.plot: After greedy men have Edmound Dantes unjustly imprisoned for 20 years for innocently delivering a letter entrusted to him, he escapes to revenge himself on them.

movies.title: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
movies.plot: In the wake of Pearl Harbor, a young lieutenant leaves his expectant wife to volunteer for a secret bombing mission which will take the war to the Japanese homeland.

events.title: the US bomb Tokyo in a surprise raid

movies.title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
movies.plot: A classic of the silent age, this film tells the story of the doomed but ultimately canonized 15th-century teenage warrior. On trial for claiming she'd spoken to God, Jeanne d'Arc is subjected to inhumane treatment and scare tactics at the hands of church court officials. Initially bullied into changing her story, Jeanne eventually opts for what she sees as the truth. Her punishment, a famously brutal execution, earns her perpetual martyrdom.

movies.title: Inherit the Wind
movies.plot: This gripping adaptation of the Jerome Lawrence-Robert E. Lee play examines an issue that still causes great controversy—the role religion should play in the schools.
movies.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 7 nominations.

events.title: John Scopes is found guilty of teaching evolution

movies.title: It's a Wonderful Life
movies.plot: A holiday favourite for generations...  George Bailey has spent his entire life giving to the people of Bedford Falls.  All that prevents rich skinflint Mr. Potter from taking over the entire town is George's modest building and loan company.  But on Christmas Eve the business's $8,000 is lost and George's troubles begin.
movies.awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 1 nomination.
